channel.title: Need a good client to test with
channel.description:
I have a great source.. actually have a few. My question is... what file do I change to make it so a source is compatible with a different client. Why? Because I have a client that I can change IP to run off Hamachi so my friend can join and help me.
Better yet.. can someone link a nice client and tell me what file to change in my source to make it compatible?

item.title: Need a good client to test with
item.dc:creator: @Onslaught Onslaught
item.description:
@Onslaught wrote:

Immortal Technique:

change the ip in EGUI.java

I thought as much…

I don’t think thats all you got to do? I run the client after I change my IP to hamachi’s IP and it tries to log in and jumps back to login screen.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a good client to test with
